CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, November 15, 1958, pg. A18 reads: " Kermit Hunter..."Golden Crucible" author - Teenie Harris photo." Portion of accompanying article by Toki Schalk Johnson reads: "Kermit Hunter, nationally known author and playwright, came to Pittsburgh this week to further plans for the June presentation of "The Golden Crucible," part of the city's bicentennial celebration.  The drama, with music for emphasis, will be totaly [totally] local...according to Mr. Hunter, the play will be shown via barges floating on the Ohio River, while the audience will be seated in a specially built theatre at the Point."
TitMainTitle: Playwright Kermit Hunter seated at table in restaurant
